text: Ammathi is a small village in Kodagu district of Karnataka state in India. ==Ammathi == Ammathi is located between Siddapura and Virajpet towns of Kodagu district. https://www.google.com/maps/dir/@12.2517999,75.9165284,13z/data=!4m4!1m3!3m2!1s0x3ba5b02f287833db:0x450fa62deb9fbec6!2sAmmathi,+Karnataka+571211,+India ==Demographics== The people of this village speak Kodava, Arebashe and Kannada and malayalam. ==References== Category:Villages in Kodagu district
title: Ammathi
